src-list.description: Image list (after this property is set, the image information of the a-image subcomponent will no longer be collected)
src-list.description_zh: 图片列表（设置了本属性之后，将不再收集 a-image 子组件的图片信息）

:v-model:current.description: Subscript for the currently displayed image
:v-model:current.description_zh: 当前展示的图片的下标

:default-current.description: Subscript for the first image shown
:default-current.description_zh: 第一张展示的图片的下标

v-model:visible.description: Whether it is visible or not, controlled attributes

default-visible.description: Whether it is visible by default and is not controlled

mask-closable.description: Click on whether the mask triggers the shutdown
mask-closable.description_zh: 点击 mask 是否触发关闭

closable.description: Whether or not to display a close button

actions-layout.description: Controls the layout of the bar

popup-container.description: Set the mount point of the pop-up box, which is the same as the to of teleport, and the default value is document.body
popup-container.description_zh: 设置弹出框的挂载点，同 teleport 的 to，缺省值是 document.body

events.name: visible-change
events.description: Preview is turned on and off
